resources.string:
Application created by Katherine Xu (katherinexu.me) 
 
Hatsune Miku created by Crypton Future Media, INC., modeling by Miyuki Kunisada (Live2D Inc.) 
Wankoromochi illustrated and modeled by Miyuki Kunisada (Live2D Inc.) 
 
"Arrow", "Arrow" by Luke Macauley 
"Music" by Mani Amini 
"Arrow", "Arrow", "Play" by Tom Walsh 
"Pause" by Alex Fuller 
"Step Forward", "Step Backward" by useiconic.com 
All icons are from thenounproject.com collection. 
 
android-crop used for cropping backgrounds
